channel.title: Industries on HIGHWIND
channel.description: Recent content in Industries on HIGHWIND

item.title: Finance
item.description: AI Use Cases in Financial Services 1. Identity Document Validation and Data Extraction 2. Customer support chatbot using LLMs 3. Product recommender for banking products and services 4. Early warning and churn detection 5. Behavioural customer segmentation 1. Identity Document Validation and Data Extraction Streamline your customer verification process by using AI to classify, validate and extract data from identity documents such as passports, driver’s licenses, and national ID cards in most countries.
